subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Saturday’s fight between Miguel Cotto and Shane Mosley hasn’t received as much buzz as Oscar De La Hoya’s recent bout with Floyd Mayweather. But it does have more potential for punching power.
snippet: Saturday’s fight between Miguel Cotto and Shane Mosley hasn’t received as much buzz as Oscar De La Hoya’s recent bout with Floyd Mayweather. But it does have more potential for punching power.
